plot: Former sharecropper, and later revolutionary Porfirio Alcalá and his four cousins participate in the Mexican Revolution and raid affluent landlords. Along their journeys, they meet two beautiful women and a talented theater-actor and makeup artist who join them in their travels.   Written by  V.Q.C.
title: El ojo de vidrio
plot_es: Former sharecropper, and later revolutionary Porfirio Alcalá and his four cousins participate in the Mexican Revolution and raid affluent landlords.
